channel.title: Musics on Akira Tanase
channel.description: Recent content in Musics on Akira Tanase

item.title: Listening Log: Week 1
item.description: Some things I listened to this week: An annoyingly catchy pop album A dense modern jazz record that I only half-understand A string quartet where the harmonic language felt weirdly “probabilistic” One recurring thought: a lot of music feels like it is exploring a space of transformations rather than a fixed melody. That is not far from how I think about symmetry groups in mathematics.
